ovdesc.p: A live file that maintains the history of the CAMT052 messages that have been generated
This file will be updated when CAMT052 message is generated on authorizing DE.STATEMENT.REQUEST record or after the service AC.XML.INTRMSTMT.GENERATE

desc.p: Id will be in the format of ACCT-YYYYMMDD-HH:MM
Identifies the date and time on which the record was created for the account
This field holds the inward reference from DE.STATEMENT.REQUEST application
It will be updated only when the request for CAMT052 comes from DE.STATEMENT.REQUEST
This field holds the XML.OUTPUT.MSG id
The value in this field will be updated after the XML.TRANSFORMATION service
This field holds the number of entries for the CAMT052
